original_text: Should not the multitude of words be answered? and should a man full of talk be justified?
korean_text: 말이 많으니 어찌 대답이 없으랴 말이 많은 사람이 어찌 의롭다 함을 얻겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Should not the multitude of words be answered?
and should a man full of talk be justified?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 말이 많은 사람이 의롭다 여겨져야 합니까?
